resources.string: I run for miles and miles, but I never actually move. What am I?
I am very slow. I only have a foot, no legs. What am I?
I am brown, have a head and a tail, but no legs or arms. What am I?
You have successfully solved every riddle in Riddle Me This! Check out Riddle Me This! on the Google Play Store soon for new updates and riddles!
Â© 2017 Akshay Sathiya All Rights Reserved
I have four eyes, but I cannot see. What am I?
The more I am taken, the more I leave behind. What am I?
Some nights you may see all of me, some you may only see a part of me, and some you may not see me at all. What am I?
I travel around the world, but I am always in the same place, what am I?
If I have it, I don\'t share it. If I share it, I don\'t have it. What is it?
What is so delicate that merely saying its name breaks it?
This feature is a work in progress! Check out the Google Play Store soon!

Answer as many riddles as you can, without any constraints such as a set number of lives or a time limit. Open up the frontier of riddles as large as you can imagine, with unlimited lives, unlimited time, and unlimited fun!
Answer as many riddles as you can before time runs out! You only have 10 seconds for each riddle! In order to beat the clock, solve these riddles as fast as you can! Are you up to the challenge?

Answer as many riddles as you can, but be careful! Every wrong guess is a lost life! This is no game of speed, but it is a game of patience and critical thinking. You start with 3 lives, and a long trail of riddles lies ahead of you. Can you make the trek?
Aw! You lost! Ready to give it another go?

Answer as many riddles as you can! You have an entire road of riddles ahead of you, and you are equipped with the most powerful weapons anyone can have: knowledge and wisdom. Are you ready to make the trek?
This app, Riddle Me This!, was created by Akshay Sathiya, in 2017. All rights reserved.
Most of the riddles featured in this app are from the following websites:
Oh no! You lost all of your lives! But this is not the end! Try, try again!
What type of tree can you hold in your hand?
What is the center of gravity?
Which eight-letter word still remains a word as you remove each letter from it, one by one?
Most of the images/pictures featured in this app are from Google Images.
